content.description: Start on big obvious jug right of the white streak and follow a few moves to the top out.
content.location: Just as you walk down into the boneyard via hallway, turn around as you enter the courtyard. Look for tall rock with big white streak on the right side.

content.description: Start matched on a chest-height crimp and follow crimps left and up into a slightly left leaning vertical rail.
content.location: west side of the first boneyard boulder

content.description: Start seated with a left hand sidepull pocket and a right hand undercling/sidepull thing and move up to a triangular pinch and climb thin crimps and slimpers up and left.   Techy egg climbing.
content.location: Southeast end of the first Boneyard boulder

content.description: Walk past the first boneyard boulder and down to the south side of the big boulder in the center of the area.    That bigass arete on the left side is Love is War.
content.protection: At least five sweaters and a handful of beanies for this one

content.description: This tricky thing squat-starts matched on a good edge in a slot ( I think ) and climbs up a couple left facing sidepulls
content.location: On the west side of the boneyard boulder to the left of The Seeker.

content.description: sit start the arete.   The crux is stabilizing on the arete and making the move up and left.
content.location: The first arete on the right.

content.description: Sit start on the left arete and follow a rail up and right to a topout that seems to be trickier than it seems...
content.protection:
Probably 3 sweaters. Maybe two if they're big wooly ones.  

  For future reference: 1 sweater = ~6 beanies depending on head size.
content.location: On the south end of the first boneyard boulder

content.description: Sit start the arete, climb to the top utilizing good holds on both faces. Work slightly right at the top out.
content.location: Really big boulder just past and downhill from the beacon boulder.

content.description: The block will come off if used as a start hold.    Sit start and do a hard first move to a PERFECT incut crimp and top the thing out.
content.location: On the overhanging east face of the big boulder roughly 100 yards straight downhill from the main boneyard cluster.

content.description: V nothing to blank vertical and sweet!
content.location: Perfect block slab at the east end of the bone yard

content.description: Start on the right side face of this arete/pillar thing and move around to the left face and climb up the slab.
content.location: The north end of the first boneyard boulder. This is the first boulder you come to at the boneyard and is visible from the road.

content.description: Small cluster of boulders that scatter down into Water World.   Mostly faces south
